name: The Bending Tree-To Pause The Last Memory
description: We are The Bending Tree. This originally was a side project created by Anton, the lead singer of the extinct metalcore band HELLCAST NIGHTMARE. With the the help of Nathan from the unstoppable band JEMA, The bending tree fuses the sound of electronic, hardcore, and experimental music. Any help from YALLS would be great. Thanks. Let the bending begin TRACKLIST: 1. For Goodness Sakes Sailor 2. Aberration 3. Dream Calypso 4. Umbrellas As Parachutes 5. The Kill Or Be Killed Situations 6. To Pause The Last Memory 7. Layover 8. Shes Such A Monroe 9. The Weekend 10. Thousand Year Door (bonus track)
